dcterms:creator: Karl Moritz Hermann
Tomas Kocisky
Edward Grefenstette
Lasse Espeholt
Will Kay
Mustafa Suleyman
Phil Blunsom
dcterms:description: The CNNDM dataset comprises online news articles sourced from the CNN and DailyMail websites, each accompanied by corresponding highlight summaries for reference.
dcterms:title: CNNDM

dcterms:creator: Shashi Narayan
Shay B Cohen
Mirella Lapata
dcterms:description: The XSUM dataset contains online articles from BBC News with single sentence summaries, which are more abstractive than those in CNNDM.
dcterms:title: XSUM

dcterms:creator: Bogdan Gliwa
Iwona Mochol
Maciej Biesek
Aleksander Wawer
dcterms:description: The SAMSum dataset contains messenger-like conversations with summaries written by linguists. Unlike CNNDM and XSUM, SAMSum involves dialogue data that includes more than two participants.
dcterms:title: SAMSum
